title: recomendations for a good pc
body: hello i've been having troubles with mi pc so, i want to buy a new one ,i don't know what computer do i need to play lol please i need help :) .{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: You can run this game on a potato...but http://pcpartpicker.com/list/jDrbKZ These specs will make it so you can max out League and play other games at decent settings as well. If you can I actually recommend getting an RX480 as they are the best price to performance cards on the market. BUt if you can afford it an Gtx 1060 is really good.

It's hard to quantify what a *good pc* is, but specifically for League you'll want to ensure your PC meets or exceeds the [recommended specs.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/#wq2)

When looking for a PC that will run League **really well**, you'll generally want to look for something with a decent amount of RAM, a strong processor, and preferably something with a dedicated graphics card.

Let me know if you have any questions.
